website_summaries.verdict: A nicely adjustable vest with pockets of many sizes.
pros: Adjustable to give you a good fit
Good padding makes it more comfortable
Front pockets work well for holding flies
Lightweight, making it a cool vest for hot weather
cons: Some people experienced issues with the zipper

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Dad is 6’2” and weighs about 250 lbs. He’s a big muscular dude with a beer belly. I was worried that the one size fits all would not fit him. I read the reviews on about 15 different fy fishing vests and chose this one. I chose right! The straps adjust on the shoulders and around each side of the trunk. He put it on on Christmas, adjusted it and then played with all the awesome different pockets. He commented he mostly liked that it has a cup holder for his beer, and is breathable netting in between so he won’t get too hot! Was definitely a win.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Price and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, plenty of well made pockets with nice easy-to-grab bright nylon pulls. Adjustments at the shoulders and waist. A well made product at a price that is unbeatable! I'd give it 10 stars if I could. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Forest

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for any fly fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a $140 or $200 wimms vest. I believe in simms products. I use there waders and boots but I had a hard time justifying paying $200 for a vest... so, I took a chance on this one... time will tell about durability but man... this vest has everything a fly fisherman would need. Pockets all in the right spot and dont interfere with casting. The flip pocket for flies is great. The holder for clamps and even the silly drink holder didnt spill a drop of diet I opened and left half full while i was wading through the eagle river in Colorado. I'm impressed and it saved me $140
customer_reviews.author: Anika S.

customer_reviews.title: quality vest, nice pockets
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice quality vest, good fabric and stitching. Good pocket arrangement. The two front pockets with the "fly hook foam"-the foam insert is removable, which is awesome. The shoulder straps feel like a nicely padded backpack. The shoulder and waiste straps make adjustments easy. You could easily fit it over a tshirt or a large Carhartt winter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mable S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest for river fishing
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this vest, I laid out everything I wanted to carry in the vest and it looked like a lot. When I got the vest I was surprised how much storage was left when I got everything in it. It has a ton of adjustment and I like that because I fish year round, sometimes in a t shirt, other times with a ton of layers on. I think this vest will cover all of these temperature scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, but really Good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1" 175lbs with athletic trim, and with this vest made to the smallest possible is just about right. I wear a 40" jacket, and there is definitely a lot of room in the chest area. If you are even more slender, this vest may be a bit too roomy. I wear over wadders so it is perfect. This all said, this vest has an incredible amount of storage. I carry a fly box so will probably just pull out the fly foam insert, but a cool feature. I like the water bottle holder but with a bigger bottle in there may get in the way, but I sinch it down when not using and its perfect. Great vest
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest to wear more for metal detecting, than fishing. The good thing about it is I can use it for both. It is lightweight and durable. I'm a big guy, the adjustments were simple and the vest fits me nicely, with room to spare. I wear a xxl Tall. It has plenty of zippered hinged pockets. The material breathes well and is comfortable. I highly recommend it for fishing and outdoors activity in general. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Derrah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is my first fly vest. It was recommended by my friend. Quality seems really good. Pockets zip smoothly, stitching seems good although there was one strap that wasn't sewn on properly. I contacted Anglatech and they sent me a new one right away. The vest is extremely comfortable. I did a 3 day trip to the Eastern Sierras and wore this vest comfortably for hours. Has plenty pockets for all your gear. The water holder is a great feature. I would definitely recommend this product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mastaxmy

customer_reviews.title: I did not think I could find one any better that held all my stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm a creature of habit. I had a fishing vest for 20 years and decided it was time to get a new one. My old fishing vest had a bunch of pockets zippers. I did not think I could find one any better that held all my stuff. However I was wrong. This is a great fishing vest Lots of pockets to store things different size pockets if it's sunglasses knife hemostat. Delivered on time and packaging not excessive.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great vest! Held everything and then some
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a trip out West. Great vest! Held everything and then some. I LOVE the water bottle holder. Very important where I was fishing as water was not readily available. My only improvement would be to shorten the lines on the front pockets. They open TOO far and the flies there tend to be out of sight. Especially if you have a full vest.
customer_reviews.author: William Ravenscraft

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Good features, but runs a bit large at waist
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the quality of this vest. The waist does run a bit large for a 5‘11“ 195 pound man like myself. The wife was kind enough to sew some bungee straps in the waist line (see pic). I also like the loops that hold the rod and reel so you can go hands-free. The water bottle holder seems to be in a bad spot so I hold my water in the back pouch, which levels out the weight of the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Merv

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Took this out for a test run the weekend after purchase. I love the space and the convince it offers for fly selection. I was able to access everything I needed with relative ease ( I was able to use both hands at the time). I would have had trouble with one hand access due to how loose it was on me. The only suggestion I would make is allow it to tighten up more. It was a bit loose. I’m 5’7” at 160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: avistart

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I'm a skinny guy and on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm a skinny guy and on the smallest adjustment I made it work. Weight seems to be pretty nicely distributed while wearing the vest. Seems well made and should last a while. For the price, I would highly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Myers

customer_reviews.title: Big guys check this out
customer_reviews.text: Im a big guy 350 plus wear a 5xl I didn't expect this product to fit and it did not BUT with a trip to the army navy store I purchased for 6 bucks two 1 1/2 straps with a clip at each end and just extended the side straps now it fits great. The reason it was so easy to make it fit is because of how this product was in basically 3 separate pieces. So not only is this a GREAT vest I'm still finding pockets but it will fit anyone maybe with a little help but for big guys out there this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vest!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his fishing vest. our favorite part is the drink holder. We also love all of the features of the pockets. Everything is pretty easy to reach and is perfect even for kayak fishing.
customer_reviews.author: JEN DINGLE

customer_reviews.title: Crippling Manufacturing Defect Ruins It - Seems Fine Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with one of the buckles for the shoulder straps on backwards. It does not stay secure due to the design of the buckle and always drops down to the longest length. I'm very disappointed in the quality control of this product. Don't waste your time and money on this. You get what you pay for. I'll be returning it very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: This is a FANTASTIC fishing vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC fishing vest. Just retired my 40 year old Richardson chest box. This is WAY BETTER in terms of comfort and workability. I did sew the flip down pockets in the front so they only open half way on each side. That vastly improved those pockets for fly boxes. Got a bunch of Maxcatch clear front fly boxes that are also fantastic. Much better approach all around compared to old school setup. BUY THIS VEST! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Caffee

customer_reviews.title: If you are lean and thin, this will be enormous on you.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this may be a fine vest, but I am a lean guy and this would fit two of me. Its HUGE, and I have to return it. Its a bummer not being a typical 'murrican with large BMI.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Moss

customer_reviews.title: Everything else is great. Love the drink holder
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on this seems to zip down on its own when I just walk around. It just could be this one. Everything else is great. Love the drink holder. fits my beer perfect. But I'm going to have to return it. One of the storage pockets ripped the first time fishing with this. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Good in the heat
customer_reviews.text: Caught about 70 some fish with this vest on. Comfortable. Good in the heat. Lots of pockets. Sits well on the shoulders. After some time, I have come to love it. Unfortunately I have to keep a cell phone on me when fly fishing, so a waterproof pocket would have been a plus. But I dangle a waterproof cell phone holder on my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than carrying around a tackle box. I know it's meant for trout and fly fishing, but I use it anytime I go to the water.
customer_reviews.author: TherealNeil

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of pockets and attachment points.
customer_reviews.text: This vest is very suitable for fly fishers of all experience levels. It has plenty of pockets and attachment points for all your zingers! The only negative was the side of the zipper. It is a left side zipper and IMO should be a right side zipper. Not a big deal, just have to get used to it. Very good quality vest.
customer_reviews.author: Cara W

customer_reviews.title: great vest
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, comfortable, and a surprising amount of storage space. I traded in fly vests for a series of hip packs and slings over the past 4 years. But I missed the convenience of having everything in its place and within easy reach. This vest brought me back to vests and I won't leave them again.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Adjust length and width
customer_reviews.text: Used it once thus far and it worked great! As time goes by and with more use, I’ll update.
customer_reviews.author: Marc S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fishing vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice vest with plenty of storage. My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ninette C Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest about 2 months ago and have only worn it 3 times and the front zipper fell off. I'm happy it has a buckle closure or it would have been junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shane1

customer_reviews.title: and it unzips far too easy. The good thing is it has an inside ...
customer_reviews.text: This vest has a left hand zipper, which is awkward for sure, and it unzips far too easy. The good thing is it has an inside buckle that keeps the vest together in the event it unzips on you. I really like the water bottle feature especially give the dry climate I am fishing. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Not just for fly fishing
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son that has lost 3 expensive iPhones while fishing. Has waterproof pockets for personal items and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a serious fly fisherman. He had worn out a vest over the years and ordered this one to replace it. When it was loaded up with all his boxes of flies and other essentials he felt that the vest was too bulky and limited his range of motion out in front. He returned it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice what else can I say. But very nice! A very nice looking product and very comfortable. I gave this to my son as a Christmas gift. Looks great that's great happy fisherman / hiker camper and whatever else I'm a real customer Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about fit. I'm 6'3", 290. Adjusted perfectly. Very happy with vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This vest has been perfect. With no boat I have to stick to shore fishing and I've been doing a lot of community lakes. This vest allows me to leave the tackle box at home becuaee I can load up everything I need in the vest. I highly recommend if you fish on the move
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fly Fishing Vest
customer_reviews.text: This is the first actual fly fishing vest I have purchased. I am a newby in fly fishing so I am getting the stuff I need. This vest is perfect for me to get started or anyone that alright has experience. The is very well made and set up perfectly for the fly fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best after research
customer_reviews.text: I researched many fishing vests and this seemed to be the best of all for the price (and even for many vests costing more). After receiving it, it appears this is still true. Very happy with the vest, and great value.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Fishing vest
customer_reviews.text: I had a slight issue with a zip pull breaking they took care of it IMMEDIATELY...GREAT CS! I haven't had a chance to get into the field with it yet, but seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Don Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This does not appear to be the 2016 Revised Design. There is no water bottle pocket and the fly pockets do not have the foam inserts as shown that hold the flies securely. Seems to be well constructed and fits well. This was purchased for my wife: 5'4" x 117lbs.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of easy access storage!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is lightweight, easy access, & the price is excellent! My fishing buddy came home & ordered one for himself!
customer_reviews.author: Elanor Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can’t beat it. Go ahead and spend 150 on the name brand, you won’t catch more fish.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Ganino Jr

customer_reviews.title: I like the new "high-tech" vests over the traditional vest
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not yet loaded the vest and taken it fishing, it appears to be well made and very well thought-out. Obviously the designer(s) are fly fisher persons. I like the new "high-tech" vests over the traditional vest. The new vests are much more comfortable and better distribute the load so it's not all on the back of the neck. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Swartzlander

customer_reviews.title: I like this vest a lot
customer_reviews.text: Original review: I like this vest a lot, but I wish it came in multiple sizes or with the ability to adjust the girth. Mine is baggy on me. Updates review: After a single season one of the shoulders straps is tearing along the seam. For $90 bucks, I expect better--that's why I went with a more expensive vest. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Luke D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The rest looks great and has great adjustments to fit almost any size. Very functional and appears to be well constructed. It has room for everything you need to carry while out waiting screen. Good product at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Troy D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Broken main zipper
customer_reviews.text: Second time tried on vest the main zipper broke informed manufacturer that I purchased from to get back to me.m After emails the manufacturer sent out a new vest. Please note they stand behind there product. Would not hesitate to buy for again!
customer_reviews.author: p mccall

customer_reviews.title: Way too large.
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest but WAYYYYYY too large for a physically fit female.
customer_reviews.author: Cy Grymus

customer_reviews.title: Its adjustable and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong, I use it when I am fly fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: and most of them were very good. There are a couple which referred to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this vest I read the reviews, and most of them were very good. There are a couple which referred to the main front zipper that would not stay zipped up. I thought that they had just received a bad one, so I went ahead and ordered it. Was delivered on time, but as soon as I took it out of the package I noticed that the zipper was only half zipped. I inspected it closely and found that it was not the quality I was expecting. It was the first thing I have ever sent back to Amazon. I have to say that they make returning an item very easy!
customer_reviews.author: hwstone

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These guys are awesome, giving the kind of service that makes me want to buy from them. This vest has more than enough storage for me to trek out all day, even room for my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Niccolo Paparella

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vest. Just got it out for the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vest. Just got it out for the first fishing trip. Seems well made and cost a fraction of similar vests from the better known companies. Love the water bottle pocket.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out design lots of storage space and areas for equipment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my needs - I am actually a photographer ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs - I am actually a photographer and there is room here for everything, lens, cf cards, filters, rain gear, business cars - you name it and there is a place for it. Great find for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice vest. It has a ton of pockets, a bunch of loops for accessory attachment, and is very adjustable for a good fit. The only reason it is not 5 stars is becaue it does not have a fly patch.
customer_reviews.author: glen atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vest!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and function for the money! I like this vest more than some of the more expensive name brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the fisherman
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandson 21 yrs old. He loves trout fishing. This was an awesome gift for him. He loves it and it is extremely functional. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: John Eberle

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight fits great. More than enough storage place for the essentials. better than a bulking backpack or chest pack. I was worried the side pockets might hinder casting. Not at all.
customer_reviews.author: DERIK CLOSE

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest  with more than enough room !!!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, cool mash, wonderful vest. The best fishing purchase I made in the last year. Thank you Anglatech !!
customer_reviews.author: Terry D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, with plenty of storage pockets. Seems to be durable with good stitching. Remembering where you put everything will be your biggest problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: A great fishing vest
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest. Lots of places for stuff
customer_reviews.author: BruceC

customer_reviews.title: This is a Fantastic vest. I have 3 other fly fishing vests ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fantastic vest. I have 3 other fly fishing vests and while are all good vests this one is the best. With the side and shoulder adjustment it can be worn with a t-shirt in summer or a heavy jacket when winter fishing for steelheads.
customer_reviews.author: James I.

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it out fishing yet. But I love it tin of storage and plenty of room. I was worried it wouldn’t fit because I’m a big guy but I actually had to tighten it up I’d definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once so far but it seems to be good quality and well designed. Not sure why I would pay three times more for other vests.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Britton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my brother as xmas gift. He loved it and is a very particular and avid angler. Seems very well built and the features it sprts are useful and not gimicky.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: One flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight material and hold a lot of equipment. Would have given a higher rating but after a few trips the pocket stitching starting coming undone. Other than that it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Plenty of storage. Drop down fly holders are nice for streamers or large dry flies. Well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Slizewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: son loves all the pockets on it as he fishes alot
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and low cost
customer_reviews.text: When it is possible to spend up to $200 for a vest, this vest provided most of the options associated with the higher priced vests, but at 1/3 the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. Everyone was jelious of the cup holder it has.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this set up. Got it as a gift. The front zipper broke but I fixed it. I’m not a pro but it holds everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding -
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my son in law who loves to fly fish, it was the best gift he received besides his waders for Christmas. Thank you - you can't go wrong with Anglatech Fly Fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, and he was quite happy with the mesh fabric. He gave it 4 instead of 5 stars because he had to transfer (from his previous vest) cords to attach tools.
customer_reviews.author: Pianomann

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest for the price but then again I've only ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest for the price but then again I've only used it two times and the pull tab on the zipper of one of the pockets has already broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Eastlick

customer_reviews.title: Love the pockets and fly organization.
customer_reviews.text: This is like wearing a tackle box. There is easy access to the many storage pockets and even water bottle pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Has many pockets to store items. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this vest - it was even better than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vest - it was even better than I thought when I ordered. There are plenty of pockets for storage and it is well made. Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J.

customer_reviews.title: A well made, comfortable vest.
customer_reviews.text: The vest was quite adjustable for me. All the seams are sown tight and no strings hanging out. Plenty of pockets and they are nicely placed for access.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Pellini

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: The 2 flip down front pockets hold a lot of flies which helps cut down on additional boxes needed and unnecessary weight.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J McMunn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the time to use it yet but I do like how many pockets it does have.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VEST
customer_reviews.text: Has multiple pockets with easy access, plus 2 zippered pockets that holds lots of flies. I just returned from a 12 day Alaska drift boat trip and this vest was very useful. It also dries rapidly when wet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Decent vest, xl, good price
customer_reviews.text: Liked the overall feel and comfort of the vest, unfortunately when I opened the front fly compartment the strap was broken and basically unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loved it. Great quality, lots of storage and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: This vest has what I need for fishing in Montana. Lots of storage while out on the river.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wilsos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - nice adjustments for fit - appears well made
customer_reviews.author: Al Dynarski

customer_reviews.title: Using the vest for an aeronautical survival vest. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Using the vest for an aeronautical survival vest. Just got it loaded and haven’t tried it on a mission. It holds a ton of stuff. Wish the zipper was reversed.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the best best at its price point!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best vest at its price point! Plenty of storage, lightweight, and the material is very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: arturo

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a really nice vest for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seems like a really nice vest for the money. Well made and lots of good size pockets. I will be fishing the Owens River next week for the first time. Only Conn I saw was that the straps for the forceps does not work. I tried to different sizes and they just fall out.
customer_reviews.author: jill wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vest
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vest. I am a 6’1” 190lbs and this jacket fits great, with plenty of room to grow. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: So many pockets! Great quality. Mesh backing with help on hot days
customer_reviews.author: Lizy

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing vest for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good and adjustable size is great for a larger man! It is just what was needed!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Staurset

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for hubby who's an avid fly fisherman but never ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for hubby who's an avid fly fisherman but never had a vest. This one fits him perfectly and has all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: nancy swartz

customer_reviews.title: great vest
customer_reviews.text: My son will now have a better vest than I have ;/
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McCuen

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made very nice quality would
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. Very well-made very nice quality would recommend
customer_reviews.author: always jingst

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: Looks great plenty of storage, just haven't had time to get to the trout steam & give it a real trial yet!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Qualls

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Vest for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product for the price. Nothing to complain about at all. Shipped supper fast and arrived ontime.
customer_reviews.author: mat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vest has so many pocket so you will have room not to forget something.
customer_reviews.author: David Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Gonna like this one on the river!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the same vest for about 15 years... And, as I was transferring gear from the old to the new, I could tell instantly I was going to like it when I'm on the river! Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I had to make a slight adjustment to the zipper because it would unzip on its own without much force. I just took a pair of pliers and bent the zipper sides closed a little and it solved my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty awesome vest
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty awesome vest. I've only used it twice so durability is the only thing I'm worried about. It functions and has a pocket for everything. I love the water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I am moderately satisfied with the product because you sent the wrong color. I ordered the khaki color but you sent the green. The vest is still nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for a good price. And I received it in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Warren

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what bang for the buck. Equals vest ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what bang for the buck. Equals vest costing $100-$200. Cant wait to use it on my trip in two weeks

product_meta.title: Anglatech Fly Fishing Vest Pack for Trout Fishing Gear and Equipment, Adjustable Size for Men and Women
feature_bullets: PLENTY OF STORAGE - Keep your fishing gear and equipment well-organized and quickly within reach.
ADJUSTABLE SIZING – Adjustable shoulder and waist straps for the perfect fit.
COMFORTABLE – Breathable mesh back allows for air to flow freely so you can stay cool and dry.
LIGHT WEIGHT - Premium materials keep this vest small and light.
